body.name: [Euthymol] Original Mouthwash, 16.9 fl oz | Fresh Breath Euthymol Original Toothpaste Flavor Natural Oral Rinse Liquid with Menthol, Pink Jelly Mouthwash for Treating Bad Breath
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 6 mins
features: 125 YEARS OF ORAL CARE HISTORY: Dating Back to 1898, Euthymol has a long and storied background in oral care. With a classic design reminiscent of British Heritage, Euthymol's DNA is all about keeping teeth and gums healthy with its fluoride-free toothpaste and refreshing oral care products.

HEALTHY GUMS: Help keep your mouth free of plaque and tartar by finishing every brush session with Euthymol Original Mouthwash. Contains VITAMIN E & FLUORIDE to help alleviate gum diseases and protect against cavities.
LASTING FRESHNESS: With the same signature taste as Euthymol's Original Toothpaste, the icy strong medicinal flavor originates from thymol oil, which is found in the thyme plant.

PINK JELLY FORMULA: Thanks to its gel-like consistency and distinct flavor, it leaves the mouth feeling brilliantly clean and fresh without the burn of most other mouthwashes. Formulated without Sodium benzoate, methyl paraben, propyl paraben, triethanolamine.
HOW TO USE: Pour a small amount into cap or a cup. Rinse for 60 seconds morning and night.
body.description: Euthymol Mouthwash Intense refreshing scent unique to Euthymol! keep your mouth cool all day with a refreshing scent that can be felt down to your chest Removes bad breath, prevents tooth decay and relieves gum disease Euthymol mouthwash contains an active ingredient (vitamin E) that relieves gum disease by removing bad breath and preventing tooth decay. Treat yourself with this mouthwash!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Euthymol Loved for over 122 years for its distinctly strong flavor and British heritage. This classic oral care brand which dates back to 1898, is formulated to help keep teeth and gums healthy with a blend of anti-plaque and specially refreshing ingredients. Feel the difference!

Unique Pink Slim Texture The texture is not liquidy and has a chewy formula, so it cares for even between the gums that cannot be reached easily with a toothbrush. Meet the new concept formulation of Euthymol mouthwash, which is addictive the more you use it. Euthymol Mouthwash Intense refreshing scent unique to Euthymol! keep your mouth cool all day with a refreshing scent that can be felt down to your chest Removes bad breath, prevents tooth decay and relieves gum disease Euthymol mouthwash contains an active ingredient (vitamin E) that relieves gum disease by removing bad breath and preventing tooth decay. Treat yourself with this mouthwash!

Fits in a bag, pocket or pouch! Keep your mouth clean and cool every day with this convenient size mouth spray for on-the-go. The most stylish daily oral care habit! Eliminate bad breath within 3 seconds Clinically tested at a dental university on the effect of removing bad breath! Experience freshness in the mouth all day with Euthymol mouth spray. Contains plant-derived ingredient, Xant Plant-derived ingredients eliminate unpleasant odors in the mouth and provide freshness without irritation. When your mouth feels stuffy, spray 1-3times in your mouth.

Toothpaste Toothbrush - Full Head Toothbrush - Small Head Breath Spray Product Type Toothpaste Toothbrush Toothbrush Breath Spray Benefit Fresh Breath, Plaque & Tartar Remover Fast and Efficient Cleaning Deep and Full Cleaning Freshening Breath Age Range Adult Adult Adult Adult Size 3.7oz 1 Pack 1 Pack 10ml

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the freshness is great it leaves in my mouth
reviews.reviewText: I just love this mouthwash. It has thickness to it & does not come out when I gargle. Thank You.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Taste was good to me. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ice Cream Meets Mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: If you're used to normal American mouthwash this will take a bit of getting used to.Where that is the consistency of water, this is more like melted ice cream (it's pink so think strawberry). It has a minty flavor that's not too strong but instructions say to keep it in your mouth for a full minute which is too long.Not enough upside here to switch from normal, much cheaper mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This Pink Mouthwash Rinse Is Not Made in England
reviews.reviewText: What caught our attention to select this was the idea of trying a brand [“EUTHYMOL”] that was reported to have been started during the year 1898. We were impressed a product could survive that long. We suspected the product was in existence because it was tried and true. We were curious. The French/English word usage on the label suggested, to us, this “original” mouthwash originated in England or France. That intrigued us even more. The vintage label even suggested nothing had changed, in all those years. You do not mess with success.We were fooled. There is little in the way of this being original, as to formulation. Back in the day, the EUTHYMOL brand supposedly used a formulation of eucalyptus and thymol. These ingredients do not appear in today’s formulation, but the taste is said to be like the toothpaste, which we understand still contains at least the thymol.What’s Thymol?Thymol is a derivative found in thyme oil, extracted from the plant family referred to as Thymus vulgaris, a flowering plant in the mint family. So, it makes sense this has historically had a mint type flavor, that some people identify with a root beer kind of taste. Now, since there is no accounting for taste, we will not try to persuade on the good or bad of that. But at least give you an idea. Thymol had been to have a pleasant aromatic odor and strong antiseptic properties, so makes sense it was being used in mouthwash. However, today, with the absence of Thymol, the manufacturers use other formulations for antiseptic properties, and colorings, thickening agents, and flavorings to mimic the past formula, the toothpaste and that pink color, which reminded us of Pepto Bismal in color and viscosity, to some degree. This is not a gel but seemed thicker than water.As for claims of benefits, there is none listed. We did learn of a study that suggested using this helped increase residual fluoride concentration in one’s saliva longer. Finally, EUTHYMOL® mouthwash was expected to improve availability of active ingredients and long-lasting freshness. Alcohol is a listed ingredient on the label. Used as we would any other mouthwash, followed-up with a water rinse. Compared to other mouthwashes, this has a premium price. It’s really geared to those who want to continue with that EUTHYMOL® taste, and pay for the privilege of having such.We are okay with all the above, however, what strikes us in a way that we must address, is that although this may have originally been a brand outta England, it’s now made in Korea. We are okay with that, but we just do not care to be led down a path that suggests differently. Also, we think the failure to picture the back of the label, with its current ingredients and location of manufacture was not the disclosure that could have been. At this time, we cannot say we would select this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It was a little pricey but worth it. I love the winter green flavor and the pink color. The color wasn't as pink as in the picture. Love the way it stays in your mouth after using. The flavor wasn't too strong which was good.I would buy this again
